About the Company: Sasken Communication Technologies Ltd (SCTL) is an embedded communications solutions provider, which assists businesses across the communication value chain accelerate their product development life cycles.The company offers a range of services in areas of research & development consultancy, wireless software products and software services, and works with network OEMs, semiconductor vendors, terminal device OEMs and operators across the world. The company provides a range of solutions for managing multiple product lines across generations of wireless technologies. It offers software services for creating and maintenance of software components in order to implement network support systems in the field. The company offers its services in area of wired and wireless networks and software components across the communications value chain.The companys wireless software product portfolio comprises embedded software IP for wireless mobile devices, a comprehensive communication and application sub-systems for OEMs and ODMs..The company also engagged in the business of Telecom Software Products, Telecom Software Services.
